item.description: Hi everyone! Can you believe it's 2012! Wow! Our resolution is to have a Super Fun Meet up Every Month! Hooray! We thought it would be fun to start off with a Chinese New Year Theme! Whether they Dress up for the Lantern Festival Parade, join in the Dragon Dance, or say Cheese for the Firworks Display Photo Op your furry friend will have fun socializing with their best friends. We cant wait to see everyone & look forward to hearing your ideas for fun meet up themes. Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Happy New Year!
